name: Always Fresh Greek Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup always fresh pitted kalamata olives
0.5 cup always fresh roasted pepper strips
1 punnet heirloom tomatoes, washed, cut in half
1 small red onion, peeled, finely sliced
1 lebanese cucumber, peeled, cut in chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing by whisking all the ingredients together and season to taste.
In a large shallow bowl, arrange the outer leaves of the lettuce around the edge of the bowl (discard any tattered outer lettuce leaves).
Tear the heart of the lettuce into small pieces.
In a smaller bowl add the Always Fresh pepper strips, tomato, onion, cucumber and torn lettuce heart. Toss in 2/3 of the dressing.
Pile into the centre of the large bowl. Scatter with feta cubes and the Always Fresh Kalamata olives.
Drizzle with the remaining dressing and scatter with dill fronds.
